doc.title: Leaping Tournament Over Elephants
doc.plot: Springing heroes of long and lofty leaps over elephants and other high objects, lead by the Bishop Brothers, champions of France; George Whitby, champion of Great Britain and Ireland; Joseph Artressi, champion of Italy; and Daniel O'Brien, American Double Somersault Leaping Champion of the World, and a few clowns who leap while you laugh.
